name: Bouldering ... At Home
description:
Improve your climber skills and reach the top of each bouldering problems.

CONTROLS:
Use your mouse to drag-and-drop your feet and hands on holds to grab them.
DO NOT PLAY IN FULLSCREEN..

Start with begginers levels to increase your characteristics, and finish all the 13 problems. Don't forget to improve your character in the Level menu !
Look for help in the main menu for more information.

This game was entirely made during the Weekly game jam 146. I hope you will have fun with it, it was pretty fun (and exhausting) to do...

Don't bother checking my other games, this is the second one I made, and the first one was a 7 hours game for the LD46. Check my soundcloud instead if you want. One day I hope I will have time to add music and sound to my games...

Edit update: Fixed Stars for levels 5A to 6C+ not working (twice..)
